text: List of all the members of the Storting in the period 1862 to 1864. The list includes all those initially elected to the Storting as well as deputy representatives where available. == Rural constituencies == ===Smaalenenes County=== {| class="wikitable" !Name !Comments/Deputy |- | Carl Sibbern | |- | Haagen Ludvig Bergh | Deputy Tollef Olsen Lund stepped in after his death on 10 Mar 1863 |- | Olai Pedersen Wiig | |- | Aimar August Sørenssen | |} ===Akershus county=== {| class="wikitable" !Name !Comments/Deputy |- | Ole Christensen Walstad | |- | Johan Sverdrup | |- | Jacob Hansen Hoelstad | |- | Harald Wedel-Jarlsberg | |} ===Hedemarkens county=== {| class="wikitable" !Name !Comments/Deputy |- | Torsten Pederesen Trøften | |- | Sivert Christensen Strøm | |- | Harald Heyerdahl | |- | Ole Bredesen | |- | Nils Jacobsen Hoel | |} ===Christians county=== {| class="wikitable" !Name !Comments/Deputy |- |Arne Hansen Baggerud | |- |Ole Brandt | |- |Michael Andreas Hammer Breien | |- | Christian Gundersen Fougner | |- | John Johnsen Harildstad | |} ===Buskeruds county=== {| class="wikitable" !Name !Comments/Deputy |- |Nils Nilsen Hilsen | |- | Morten Ludvig Sundt | |- |Hans Jacob Hofgaard | |- | Olaus Olsen Færden | |} ===Jarlsberg and Laurvigs county=== {| class="wikitable" !Name !Comments/Deputy |- |Nils Nilsen Enge |Deputy Christian Torber Hegge Geelmuyden stepped in after 16 March 1864. |- | Hans Jacob Olsen Aschjem | |- | Georg Prahl Harbitz | |- | Jakob Olsen Schjerven |Was ill in 1862 but returned in 1864. title: List of members of the Parliament of Norway, 1862–64
